name: Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules
description:
Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

Shedding flab off your body can be a daunting task and especially if you are an obese or extremely overweight. However, this task has to be accomplished because obesity is the cause of various cardiovascular issues and diabetes. Nutrex Lipo-6 Black capsules will catalyse your workout plan and lets you achieve your weight loss goals in the given time frame. The powerful unflavoured dietary supplement has a high potency, so one pill is enough to create the ripples inside your body. With so many weight-loss formulas in the market.

Benefits

Bitter Orange Extract: Fat Burner

Nutrex Lipo-6 Black Ultra Concentrate (UC) capsules Unflavoured by MPN are so powerful that just one pill a day is enough to blast off that fat off your body, albeit at a steady speed. The supplement is enriched with the properties of Advantra Z Citrus Aurantium that delivers the goodness of bitter orange extract, which as a result aids in faster weight loss. Moreover, the ingredient controls appetite and thereby helps you manage your portion intake and weight loss progress.

Theobromine Anhydrous-The ‘Push Your Limits’ Benefits

Another amazing ingredient in Nutrex Lipo-6 Black (UC) capsules is Theobromine Anhydrous increases mental focus during your training sessions and supports muscle recovery. The compound is similar to caffeine with an only difference for the time the latter stays in the body. In addition to this, Theobromine widens the blood vessels for proper blood and oxygen flow during exercise sessions. The vasodilatation property plays a key role in reducing fat from your body by giving you ample amount of energy to infuse in your training sessions.

Ingredients

Caffeine Anhydrous, Theobromine Anhydrous, Yohimbine Anhydrous, Rauwolscine, Glycerine, vegetable cellulose, water, Polysorbate 80, FD&C Blue 1, FD&C Red 40, FD&C Yellow 6.

Usage

Take 1 Black Capsule in the morning and 1 capsule in the afternoon. Never take more than 2 servings within 24 hours of the timeline. For best results, consume a pill 30 minutes prior to a meal.

Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

name: Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 90 Caps
description:
Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 1000 mg, 90 Capsules

  • Non-GMO
  • GMP Certified
  • Contionally Essential Amino Acid
  • Nitric Oxide Precursor*

Product description

L-Arginine is a conditionally essential basic amino acid involved primarily in urea metabolism and excretion, as well as in DNA synthesis and protein production.* It is an important precursor of Nitric Oxide (NO) and thus plays a role in the dilation of blood vessels.* The L-Arginine used in this product is Pharmaceutical Grade.

name: Sunline Alaska CLA 90 Softgels
description:
Sunline Alaska Total Lean CLA 1000mg 90 Softgels

Product description

CLA (conjugated linoleic acid) is a class of fatty acids produced by animals that is naturally found in beef and dairy products. Although CLA plays an important role in a number of cellular metabolic processes, humans are not able to produce CLA and therefore can only obtain it from the diet.* Since CLA is generally more abundant in grazing animals, changes in agricultural practices have resulted in less CLA in our foods, decreasing its availability in modern diets. Therefore, using a CLA supplement is recommended to obtain desirable levels of CLA for its optimal effects.* Sunline Alaska CLA is derived from non-GMO safflower oil and delivers 800 mg CLA per softgel.

name: MusclePharm Carnitine Core Liquid Diet Supplement
description:
MusclePharm Carnitine Core Liquid Diet Supplement

Product description

MusclePharm Carnitine Core assists in transporting long-chain fatty acids into the mitochondria (the cells’ “power plant”) to make this process more effective. This amplifies an athlete’s ability to metabolize fat into muscular energy. While the body produces carnitine naturally, many athletes supplement their intake. Raspberry ketones act as a natural energy booster for anybody on a low-calorie diet.
short_description:
MusclePharm Carnitine Core Liquid Diet Supplement

  • Improved metabolism for weight loss: carnitine core capsules help transport long-chain fatty acids into the mitochondria to be metabolized for energy, enhancing weight loss
  • Helps reduce body fat : the mitochondria is the cell’s powerhouse it works to process fats into energy. Carnitine core capsules are used to expedite this process, which helps reduce body fat
  • Helps athletic performance and endurance: while the body produces carnitine naturally, athletes and workout enthusiasts can supplement their carnitine level with carnitine core capsules
  • Banned-substance tested: we care about the products you put into your body. Our carnitine core capsules are banned-substance tested and certified by informed-choice

name: RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout Amino Energy, Fat Burner - 30 Servings
description:
RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout Amino Energy, Fat Burner - 30 Servings

  • Clean Active Nutrition
  • 5 g Essential Amino Acids
  • Weight Management
  • Mental Focus
  • Natural & Artificial Flavors
  • Zero Calories
  • Zero Sugar
  • 30 Total Servings
  • Third-Party Tested
  • Dietary Supplement
  • CarnoSyn® Carnosine Synthesize
  • InnovaTea®

RSP was born to help people achieve their health and fitness goals. We live to partner with you in achieving those goals. Whether you're a busy professional trying out a new fitness program or a lifelong athlete, we know this can be challenging. Our mission is to create nutritional products that make your journey both heathy and enjoyable, without ever asking you to choose between quality and convenience. So set a goal, fuel up, beat a personal best, recover and repeat. We have your back every step of the way.

Anytime Energy & Performance
125 mg natural caffeine from fermented tea leaves to support energy levels, focus and alertness.

Essential Amino Acids for Muscle Recovery
Comprehensive blend of essential amino acids to boost performance and support muscle development & repair.

Weight Management Support
CLA, Carnitine, Green Tea Extract and Green Coffee Extract promote weight management.

Suggested Use

Mix 2 scoops (1 serving) of AminoLean® in 8-10 oz of cold water anytime throughout the day.

Recommended Use:

For Anytime Energy & EAA's: Take 1 or more servings first thing in the morning and/or between meals.

For Pre-Workout & EAA's: Take 1-3 servings 20-30 minutes before training.

For Recovery & EAA's: Take 1-2 serving after training and/or between meals.

Do not exceed more than 6 scoops (3 servings) in a 4 hour period and do not exceed more than 8 scoops (4 servings) in a 24 hour period.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, natural & artificial flavors, maltodextrin, sucralose, fiber blend (cellulose gum, xanthan gum, carrageenan), acesulfame potassium, FD&C red #40, FD&C blue #1

name: Nutrex Research, LIPO-6 Carnitine, 60 Capsules
description:
Nutrex Research, LIPO-6 Carnitine, 60 Capsules

L-Carnitine plays an important metabolic role in fat burning and energy production. Scientific research has demonstrated that L-Carnitine assists your body in converting fat to energy. L-Carnitine helps to tap into your body's fat supply by providing support to have fatty acids transport to your muscles where the fat can be burned as energy. This process can aid in weight loss and improve athletic performance such as increased endurance.

L-Carnitine is not a stimulant and can easily be combined with other diet products. To optimize results LIPO- 6 Carnitine provides L-Carnitine in fast-absorbing liquid capsules.

Suggested Use

Recommended use on training days: Take one serving 30 minutes before exercising with a glass of water or a beverage of your choice.

Recommended use on non-training days: Take one serving with a glass of water or a beverage of your choice at any time of the day between meals.

Other Ingredients

Glycerin, vegetable cellulose**, purified water.

**This product utilizes only natural vegetable capsules that are free of animal products.
